entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Drayton Valley

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Sunday 26 March 2023
